p: Daily feed intake was not impacted by tanks or diet. However, it was slightly impacted by the initial size and, naturally, time ( p = 4 × 10 −15 of the fish ( p = 6 × 10 −6) with larger animals consuming more feed than smaller ones. There were no interactions between primary factors and, as expected, no differences observed in feed intakes between diets at any given time (restrictive pair-fed feeding strategy). Further analysis regressing daily intake vs fish weight (at t end) vs PPB fraction found that, apart from the strong correlation with fish weight ( p = 1 × 10 −18), there was a significant positive correlation with PPB inclusion (0.005, R 2 = 0.9).
